```{r}
x <- c( 1, 2, NA, 3, NA)
y <- c(NA, 3, NA, 3, 4)
```

```{r}
is.na(x)

```

```{r}
which(is.na(x))
```

```{r}
which(is.na(y))
```

```{r}
sum(is.na(x) & is.na(y))
```

Now turn it into a fucntion

```{r}
both_na <- function(x,y){
  sum(is.na(x) & is.na(y))
}
```

```{r}
x <- c(NA, NA, NA)
y1 <- c( 1, NA, NA)
y2 <- c( 1, NA, NA, NA)

```

```{r}
both_na(x, y2)
```



```{r}
x <- c(NA, NA, NA)
y3 <- c( 1, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA)
both_na(x, y3)

```
```{r}
length(x)
length(y3)
```
 
Add a check for when inputs x and y are not the same length
```{r}
both_na2 <- function(x,y){
  if(length(x) != length(y))
    stop("Input x and y should be the same length")
  sum(is.na(x) & is.na(y))
}
```

```{r}
both_na2(x, y2)
```
